Executives from Cambridge Analytica speak to undercover reporters from Channel 4 News about the tactics used by the company to help clients, including entrapping rival candidates in fake bribery stings and hiring sex workers to seduce them.
Cambridge Analytica said the investigation contained false claims, factual inaccuracies and substantial mischaracterisations.
It accused Channel 4 of setting out to entrap staff by initiating a conversation about unethical practices.
